page.title: 01POPULATION/HOUSING
page.content: This flat fenland area, only just above sea level, is mainly intensely farmed agriciltural land. The market town of Spalding lies 5 kilometers to the the North West. Part of the village of Cowbit, mentioned in the original Domesday Book,is included in our designated area. The church, the school and the village hall are adjacent to one another. Five interconnecting roads flanked by bungalows, detached and semidetached houses form homes for the 138 families living in the main part of the village.. The children carried out house to house surveys and collected information about the people living in the area.
